title: Technical Tracks
subtitle: Explore the fields we offer to help you grow and innovate.

tracks.name: Cyber Security
tracks.title: What makes Cyber Security track essential?
tracks.description: The Cyber Security track focuses on protecting digital systems, networks, and data from cyber threats. You'll learn about ethical hacking, network security, cryptography, vulnerability assessment, and incident response. This track prepares you to defend against cyber attacks and secure critical information systems.

tracks.name: Flutter
tracks.title: What makes Flutter track essential?
tracks.description: The Flutter track teaches you how to build beautiful, cross-platform mobile applications using Google's Flutter framework. You'll master Dart programming, UI/UX design principles, state management, API integration, and app deployment. Create apps that run seamlessly on both iOS and Android.

tracks.name: Front End
tracks.title: What makes Front End track essential?
tracks.description: The Front End track covers everything you need to create stunning, interactive web interfaces. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, modern frameworks like React, and responsive design. Build user-friendly websites that provide excellent user experiences across all devices.

tracks.name: Back End Node.js
tracks.title: Why is the Back End - Node.js (JavaScript) track essential?
tracks.description: The Back End - Node.js track teaches you how to build fast, scalable server-side applications using JavaScript. You will work with Node.js and frameworks like Express, connect to SQL and NoSQL databases, and build APIs that power modern web and mobile apps.
topics: Server-side development with Node.js and Express
Database design and integration with MongoDB and SQL databases
Cloud deployment (e.g., Render, Railway, AWS, or Azure)
Scalability, performance, and best practices in Node.js backends

tracks.name: Back End .NET
tracks.title: Why is the Back End .NET (C#) track essential?
tracks.description: The Back End .NET (C#) track teaches you how to build secure and scalable server-side applications using the .NET platform. You will learn to work with ASP.NET Core, relational databases using SQL Server, and modern APIs that power real-world web and mobile apps.
topics: Database design and implementation with SQL Server
Deployment and hosting on cloud platforms (e.g., Azure)
Application architecture, layering, and best practices in .NET

tracks.name: UI-UX
tracks.title: What makes UI/UX track essential?
tracks.description: The UI/UX track focuses on creating intuitive, user-centered designs. Learn user research, wireframing, prototyping, visual design principles, and usability testing. Design digital products that are not only beautiful but also functional and user-friendly.

tracks.name: Hardware
tracks.title: What makes Hardware track essential?
tracks.description: The Hardware track introduces you to electronics, embedded systems, and IoT development. Learn circuit design, microcontroller programming (Arduino, Raspberry Pi), sensors, actuators, and hardware-software integration. Build physical projects that interact with the real world.

tracks.name: AI
tracks.title: What makes AI track essential?
tracks.description: The AI track explores artificial intelligence and machine learning. Learn Python for data science, machine learning algorithms, neural networks, deep learning, and AI model deployment. Create intelligent systems that can learn, predict, and make decisions.
topics: Python for Data Science and AI
